title: Curly Hair Solutions Curl Keeper, 8 Ounce
description: Dryness causes fizziness and out of control hair. Curl keeper controls all frizz and allows you to become the master of gorgeous frizz free curls. Curl keeper is water based which means you can use it every day without product buildup. Your style will last for days as its unique formula re activates with water making curl keeper 100% effective in humid weather conditions.

title: Natural Hair Loss Shampoo 16oz.
description:
One of your first considerations about hair loss should be what is
in your shampoo and hair care products.

The last thing that you want is more chemicals on your scalp.
Many hair care products can actually cause hair loss. The
chemicals in these can be too harsh and damage your scalp or
follicles over a period of use and leave harmful residue.

Only the purest natural ingredients that are proven to prevent hair
loss and help rejuvenate your scalp and follicles are in this formula.

This gentle natural shampoo restores essential nutrients, building
strength and fullness without weighing hair down. Designed to
cleanse pores and unblock follicles encouraging growth.

title: 32 Pcs Black Rod Makeup Brush Cosmetic Set Kit with Case
description:
Size: 
Open size: 28 " * 9 1/2 " (72cm * 24.cm) 
Close size: 9 1/2 " * 5 1/2 " (24cm * 14.cm) 
Material: Natural hair 
Color: Black Brushes 
set contains: Powder Brush, Large Contour Brush, Square Shadier Brush, Large Sable Shadier Brush, Small Sable Shadier Brush, Lip Brush, Mascara Brush, Large Synthetic Shadier Brush, Etc This 32 pc set includes all the brushes you'll ever need to create perfectly polished makeup styles. Perfect for professional salons or personal use! Each brush is covered with a clear plastic wrap for cleanliness. Our exclusively selected natural hair mineral makeup brushes will make a great addition to your collection. This complete collection of luxury makeup brushes includes the essential brushes used by professional makeup artists throughout the makeup world. 
How to clean makeup brushes: 
1. Run the bristles of brush under warm running water. 
2. Apply a small amount of gentle shampoo to bristles and work into a light lather.
3. Rinse bristles thoroughly under running water. You will notice that the water leaving the brush is tinted from old makeup. 
4. Continue rinsing until no color leaves the brush. 
5. Allow it to air-dry.
